text: Ricardo Delgado is a film and comic book artist who has worked on films including The Incredibles, Men in Black and Apollo 13.Ricardo F. Delgado He is the creator of the Age of Reptiles comic book series, as well as one of the production designers of Disney's Atlantis: The Lost Empire. Delgado is of Costa Rican descent and lives in Los Angeles, California. He has produced a third Age of Reptiles volume, titled "The Journey", for Dark Horse Comics, published in 2010, as well as two novels, Sam Specter and the Book of Spells, a children's genre story, and Warhead, a science fiction crime story.
